PHRASE.LANG: Value Pack definitivo de Novus Prime

Unlock the ultimate sci-fi action collection in PlayStation®Home with every piece of Novus Prime content ever released by Hellfire Games! The Novus Prime Ultimate Value Pack contains over 80 items: every fighter ship, weapon, outfit, XP and Nebulon boost, mission expansion, companion, paint job, game enhancement, clothing item, and personal space available for Novus Prime.

- Officer’s Quarters Personal Space
